name: Cannon Era
description:
A, D  =  Right Left

Arrow Left, Right =  Right Left 
Space = Shoot

A simple relaxing game set in the 3 main eras of human evolutions! the only mission in this game is for you to destroy everything in your way as efficient as possible (using as least amount of balls) and reach the city area (Stage 3 level 5) Good Luck Have Fun! 
Note:

on each level you will gain additional balls, but remember NOT to waste your balls! :)

Potential Future Updates:

- Higher shooting range

- Better player controls

- Trophy Reward on Game End

- More Particles

- More Animation

- New models: Log, Wood Lantern, Lighting, Sign Decor

Credits:

All sfx and musics were taken from freesound.org all credits goes to its rightful owner

Made during: WGJ 164 - Theme "Hurl"

Made By: ToastedButter (GoofyPomPom & iToaster(My little brother))

P.S:

This is my second jam and my lil bro's first so any feedback are very much appreciated! :)

Download for much better performance!
